channel.title: Archived Albums - Azure Onyxscore
channel.description:
Because Audius isn't too harsh to new users when it come to upload time, I've decided to take advantage of it and release my past albums to the public. This is intended to be used for entertainment purposes, and will be updated whenever existing tracks on SoundCloud gets deleted.
also, enjoy the light compression this website offers
Going from newest to oldest:
Butterfly XVI https://audius.co/azureonyxscore/playlist/butterfly-xvi-1980
Cerulean Freshman https://audius.co/azureonyxscore/playlist/cerulean-freshman-1981
14th Blue Tie https://audius.co/azureonyxscore/playlist/14th-blue-tie-1982
13 https://audius.co/azureonyxscore/playlist/13-1984

item.title: Archived Albums - Azure Onyxscore
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
Because Audius isn’t too harsh to new users when it come to upload time, I’ve decided to take advantage of it and release my past albums to the public. This is intended to be used for entertainment purposes, and will be updated whenever existing tracks on SoundCloud gets deleted.

also, enjoy the light compression this website offers

Going from newest to oldest:

Butterfly XVI

Audius

Audius - Empowering Creators

Audius is a music streaming and sharing platform that puts power back into the hands of content creators.
